ygData.subject: Begging and drinking
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all I remember that someone wrote that begging from a ship is not possible anymore. Well I tried and it worked. When I tried to beg from the ship, I was on
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all

I remember that someone wrote that begging from a ship is not possible
anymore. Well I tried and it worked. When I tried to beg from the ship, I
was on my way to Freeport I got the message "You are to far away from
targeted npc" or something like that, but when I came closer to that wooden
thing that goes out of the ship, I think it's mast ut I'm not sure I was
able to beg from the ship.
Ohh yes I have met a warrior and he said that if you get drunk every day
with fish or red wine then after a week or so the efects will be permanent.
The strenght boost will stay forever. You'll still be as inteligent as a
brick but it's good for tanks I suppose.

Asandir
